  Scrap Garden is a charming puzzle platformer about  the  adventures
  of Canny, a lonely robot, who awakens in a  post-apocalyptic  world
  to find all other robots shut down and seized up. What  happened to
  the City? Why did all robots stop moving? Did anyone survive except
  him? Little rusty Canny has to do all he  can to  find  answers  to
  these questions... and try to fix it all.

  For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/465760/
